languages.text: "Великий Кукловод? Неужели... С-сам Вект пригласил тебя в эти палаты?" {n}Архонт давится собственными словами, но быстро берет себя в руки.{/n} "Как бы то ни было, пускай ты и наш гость, Аребенниан, но на данном представлении ты лишь зритель. А, как ты, несомненно, знаешь, зрителям не место на сцене — не вмешивайся".

traits.locale_text: "Великий Куловод? Неужели... С-сам Вект пригласил тебя в эти палаты?" {n}Архонт давится собственными словами, но быстро берет себя в руки.{/n} "Как бы то ни было, пускай ты и наш гость, Аребенниан, но на данном представлении ты лишь зритель. А, как ты, несомненно, знаешь, зрителям не место на сцене — не вмешивайся".
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "The Puppet Master? Has... has Vect himself invited you to this chamber?" {n}The Archon chokes on his own words but quickly regains his composure.{/n} "No matter. You may be our guest, Arebennian, but you are merely a spectator in this performance. And spectators do not belong on the stage, as you undoubtedly know. Do not interfere."
languages.original_text: "Великий Кукловод? Неужели... С-сам Вект пригласил тебя в эти палаты?" {n}Архонт давится собственными словами, но быстро берет себя в руки.{/n} "Как бы то ни было, пускай ты и наш гость, Аребенниан, но на данном представлении ты лишь зритель. А, как ты, несомненно, знаешь, зрителям не место на сцене — не вмешивайся".

You may our guest, Arebennian, but you are merely a spectator in this performance. And the spectators do not belong on the stage, as you undoubtedly know. Do not interfere."

You may be our guest, Arebennian, but you are merely a spectator in this performance. And spectators do not belong on the stage, as you undoubtedly know. Do not interfere."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: “傀儡大师？莫非是……维克特本人邀请你来到此地的吗？”{n}执政官被自己的话吓了一跳，但很快就恢复了镇定。{/n}“不要紧，或许你是我们的客人，独角，但你仅仅是这场表演的观众。观众并不属于舞台，你无疑很清楚这一点。请不要插手。”
languages.original_text: "The Puppet Master? Has... has Vect himself invited you to this chamber?" {n}The Archon chokes on his own words but quickly regains his composure.{/n} "No matter. You may be our guest, Arebennian, but you are merely a spectator in this performance. And spectators do not belong on the stage, as you undoubtedly know. Do not interfere."

traits.locale_text: “伟大的傀儡大师？莫非是……维克特本人邀请你来到此地的吗？”{n}执政官被自己的话吓了一跳，但很快就恢复了镇定。{/n}“不要紧，或许你是我们的客人，独角，但你仅仅是这场表演的观众。观众并不属于舞台，你无疑很清楚这一点。请不要插手。”
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: 「偉大なる人形使い？まさか…ヴェクト本人がお前をここに招待したのか？」{n}アーコンは自らの言葉に声を詰まらせたが、すぐに冷静さを取り戻した。{/n}「構わぬ。アーベニアン、お前は客人かもしれないが、この芝居では単なる観客に過ぎない。そしてご存知のように、観客は舞台に上がることができない。邪魔立てするな」
languages.original_text: "The Puppet Master? Has... has Vect himself invited you to this chamber?" {n}The Archon chokes on his own words but quickly regains his composure.{/n} "No matter. You may be our guest, Arebennian, but you are merely a spectator in this performance. And spectators do not belong on the stage, as you undoubtedly know. Do not interfere."

traits.locale_text: 「偉大なる人形使い？まさか…ヴェクト本人がお前をここに招待したのか？」{n}アーコンは自らの言葉に声を詰まらせたが、すぐに冷静さを取り戻した。{/n}「構わぬ。アーベニアン、お前は客人かもしれないが、この芝居では単なる観客に過ぎない。そしてご存知のように、観客は舞台に上がることができない。邪魔立てするな」
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: «¿El Titiritero? ¿Te... te ha invitado Vect personalmente a esta cámara?». {n}El Arconte se atraganta con sus palabras, pero recupera rápidamente la compostura.{/n} «No importa. Puede que seas nuestro invitado, Arebennian, pero no eres más que un espectador en esta función. Y los espectadores no deben subir al escenario, como ya sabes. No interfieras».
languages.original_text: "The Puppet Master? Has... has Vect himself invited you to this chamber?" {n}The Archon chokes on his own words but quickly regains his composure.{/n} "No matter. You may be our guest, Arebennian, but you are merely a spectator in this performance. And spectators do not belong on the stage, as you undoubtedly know. Do not interfere."

traits.locale_text: «¿El Gran Titiritero? ¿Te... te ha invitado Vect personalmente a esta cámara?». {n}El Arconte se atraganta con sus palabras, pero recupera rápidamente la compostura.{/n} «No importa. Puede que seas nuestro invitado, Arebennian, pero no eres más que un espectador en esta función. Y los espectadores no deben subir al escenario, como ya sabes. No interfieras».
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: « Le Marionnettiste ? Je... Vect lui-même vous aurait invité en ce lieu ? » {n}L'Archonte semble d'abord buter sur ses mots, mais reprend bien vite contenance.{/n} « Peu importe. Votre présence sera tolérée, Arebennian, mais vous n'êtes là qu'en tant que spectateur. Et comme vous le savez, les spectateurs ne font pas partie du spectacle. Alors, contentez-vous d'observer. »
languages.original_text: "The Puppet Master? Has... has Vect himself invited you to this chamber?" {n}The Archon chokes on his own words but quickly regains his composure.{/n} "No matter. You may be our guest, Arebennian, but you are merely a spectator in this performance. And spectators do not belong on the stage, as you undoubtedly know. Do not interfere."

traits.locale_text: « Le Grand Marionnettiste ? Je... Vect lui-même vous aurait invité en ce lieu ? » {n}L'Archonte semble d'abord buter sur ses mots, mais reprend bien vite contenance.{/n} « Peu importe. Votre présence sera tolérée, arebennian, mais vous n'êtes là qu'en tant que spectateur. Et comme vous le savez, les spectateurs ne font pas partie du spectacle. Alors contentez-vous d'observer. »
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Der Puppenspieler? Hat ... hat Vect selbst Euch in die Kammer geladen?" {n}Der Archon verschluckt sich an seinen eigenen Worten, beruhigt sich aber rasch wieder.{/n} "Wie dem auch sei. Seid unser Gast, Arebennian, aber bei dieser Vorstellung nur als Zuschauer. Und Zuschauer gehören nicht auf die Bühne, wie Ihr mit Sicherheit wisst. Mischt Euch nicht ein."
languages.original_text: "The Puppet Master? Has... has Vect himself invited you to this chamber?" {n}The Archon chokes on his own words but quickly regains his composure.{/n} "No matter. You may be our guest, Arebennian, but you are merely a spectator in this performance. And spectators do not belong on the stage, as you undoubtedly know. Do not interfere."

traits.locale_text: "Der große Puppenspieler? Hat ... hat Vect selbst Euch in die Kammer geladen?" {n}Der Archon verschluckt sich an seinen eigenen Worten, beruhigt sich aber rasch wieder.{/n} "Wie dem auch sei. Seid unser Gast, Arebennian, aber bei dieser Vorstellung nur als Zuschauer. Und Zuschauer gehören nicht auf die Bühne, wie Ihr mit Sicherheit wisst. Mischt Euch nicht ein."
traits.speaker: VectThrone_Court_Real_Vect

languages.text: "Kuklacı? Seni Vect'in kendisi mi davet etti buraya?" {n}Arkon'un dili bir anlığına tutulsa da hemen kendi toparlıyor.{/n} "Önemli değil. Misafirimiz olabilirsin Arebannian ancak bu tiyatro oyununun yalnızca bir izleyicisisin ve şüphesiz senin de bildiğin gibi, izleyiciler sahneye ait değillerdir. Karışma."
languages.original_text: "The Puppet Master? Has... has Vect himself invited you to this chamber?" {n}The Archon chokes on his own words but quickly regains his composure.{/n} "No matter. You may be our guest, Arebennian, but you are merely a spectator in this performance. And spectators do not belong on the stage, as you undoubtedly know. Do not interfere."

traits.locale_text: "Kuklacı? Seni Vect'in kendisi mi davet etti buraya?" {n}Arkon'un dili bir anlığına tutulsa da hemen kendi toparlıyor.{/n} "Önemli değil. Misafirimiz olabilirsin Arebannian ancak bu tiyatro oyununun yalnızca bir izleyicisisin ve şüphesiz senin de bildiğin gibi, izleyiciler sahneye ait değillerdir. Karışma."
